info.title: ConvertAPI
info.description:
# High-Performance File Conversion API
Convert Word, Excel, PowerPoint, HTML, PDF and Image formats with our powerful file conversion service.
We support more than [200 file types.]( https://www.convertapi.com/doc/file-formats)

post.summary: File upload to the ConvertAPI file server
post.description:
When source files require multiple conversions, optimizing performance is possible by uploading the file once and then performing multiple conversions without the need for re-uploading.
The uploaded file is securely stored on the convertapi.com server for a maximum period of 3 hours and can be accessed through a unique secret URL with a UUID.
In conversion requests, the file can be referenced using the File ID, which is generated upon successful file upload.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description:
File name.
Required if the header field `content-disposition` is not set.

parameters.name: content-disposition
parameters.description:
This header field is used to determine the file name.
**Required** if query parameter `filename` is not set.
Query parameter `filename` overrides this parameter.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Custom ID for the file that is uploaded. Lowercase alphanumeric character string.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description:
Remote file URL. The URL of the file you want to upload and store on the ConvertAPI file server.
If the file is accessible by the URL, it can be uploaded directly from its location by passing the URL instead of the file itself.

parameters.name: headername
parameters.description: Remote file request header field name (used exclusively in conjunction with the `url` parameter).

parameters.name: headervalue
parameters.description: Remote file request header field value (used exclusively in conjunction with the `url` and `headername` parameters).

multipart/form-data.example:
There can be only one part with file data.
```http
[POST]
https://v2.convertapi.com/upload 
Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW

------7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="my_file.doc"

--FILE DATA--
------7MA4YWxkTrZu0gW--
```

400.description: File request with an invalid file ID

415.description: The file type is not supported

500.description: Unable to store or download remote file

get.summary: File download from the ConvertAPI file server

parameters.name: download
parameters.description:
- `attachment` - download a file
- `inline` - view file in a web browser

delete.description: If the file is no longer required it can be deleted. Otherwise, it will be automatically deleted after 3 hours.

head.summary: Get file information without receiving file

get.description:
The endpoint returns information about a user account.
It is helpful to check the account balance status and other data.
The /user endpoint can be authenticated only with a secret.
The token is not accepted.
The endpoint that returns information about your usage statistics based on the date range.

SourceFormat.description: Source file format (docx, pdf, jpg etc.)

DestinationFormat.description: Destination file format (docx, pdf, jpg etc.)

/convert/ai/to/jpg.summary: AI to JPG File Conversion API
/convert/ai/to/jpg.description:
The API for converting images to JPG files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/ai-to-jpg

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ImageResolution.description: Set output image resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

ColorSpace.description:
Set image color space.
 * `default` - Default
 * `rgb` - RGB
 * `srgb` - sRGB
 * `cmyk` - CMYK
 * `gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/ai/to/png.summary: AI to PNG File Conversion API
/convert/ai/to/png.description:
The API for converting images to Portable Network Graphic (PNG) images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/ai-to-png

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ImageResolution.description: Set output image resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

TransparentColor.description: Add alpha channel to image, setting pixels matching color to transparent. Values accepted are RGBA, CMYK hex string, color name or RGB format like this 255,255,255 (RED=255, GREEN=255, BLUE=255) or 255,255,255,150 with alpha chanel.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/any/to/zip.summary: ANY to ZIP File Conversion API
/convert/any/to/zip.description:
The API for creating ZIP archives. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/any-to-zip

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

Files.description: Files to be converted. Value can be URL or file content. If used in query or multipart content parameter must be suffixed with index e.g. Files[0], Files[1], Files[2]...

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

CompressionLevel.description:
Set compression level.
 * `Optimal` - Optimal
 * `Medium` - Medium
 * `Fastest` - Fastest
 * `NoCompression` - No Compression

Password.description: Sets the password to protect archive.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/bmp/to/pdf.summary: BMP to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/bmp/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting images to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/bmp-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Rotate.description:
Rotate image by degree. Auto rotation using EXIF supported for TIFF and JPEG images.
 * `0` - Preserve original
 * `90` - 90
 * `180` - 180
 * `270` - 270
 * `auto` - Auto using EXIF

ColorSpace.description:
Set image color space.
 * `default` - Default
 * `rgb` - RGB
 * `srgb` - sRGB
 * `cmyk` - CMYK
 * `gray` - Gray

ColorProfile.description:
Set image color profile. Some profiles will override the ColorSpace property.
 * `default` - Default
 * `isocoatedv2` - ISO Coated v2

MarginHorizontal.description: Set the page horizontal margin in millimeters (mm).

MarginVertical.description: Set the page vertical margin in millimeters (mm).

PageSize.description:
The property scales each image to fit a given page size.
 * `default` - Image size
 * `a0` - A0
 * `a1` - A1
 * `a2` - A2
 * `a3` - A3
 * `a4` - A4
 * `a5` - A5
 * `a6` - A6
 * `a7` - A7
 * `a8` - A8
 * `a9` - A9
 * `a10` - A10
 * `letter` - Letter
 * `legal` - Legal

PageOrientation.description:
Set page orientation. Works only with the PageSize property when it is set to a value other than the Image size.
 * `default` - Image orientation
 * `portrait` - Portrait
 * `landscape` - Landscape

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/chm/to/jpg.summary: CHM to JPG File Conversion API
/convert/chm/to/jpg.description:
The API for converting electronic books (e-book) to JPG images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/chm-to-jpg

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

JpgType.description:
Set JPG type.
 * `jpeg` - RGB (Full Colors)
 * `jpegcmyk` - CMYK
 * `jpeggray` - Grayscale

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)
 * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6)
 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%

 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray

Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

/convert/doc/to/txt.summary: DOC to TXT File Conversion API
/convert/doc/to/txt.description:
The API for converting Word documents to Text files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/doc-to-txt

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

Substitutions.description: Replace similar symbols with their counterparts in a text file, such as a copyright symbol with (c).

LineBreaks.description: Inserts line breaks at the end of each line of text.

TextEncoding.description:
Specifies what encoding the parser should use when converting text files.
 * `auto` - Auto
 * `ascii` - ASCII
 * `utf-7` - UTF-7 encoding
 * `utf-8` - UTF-8 encoding
 * `iso-8859-1` - ISO-8859-1
 * `iso-8859-2` - ISO-8859-2
 * `iso-8859-6` - ISO-8859-6
 * `iso-8859-15` - ISO-8859-15
 * `windows-1252` - Windows-1252
 * `arabicasmo` - Arabic ASMO
 * `baltic` - Baltic
 * `centraleuropean` - Central European
 * `cyrillic` - Cyrillic
 * `europa` - Europa
 * `extalphalowercase` - Extended Alpha lowercase
 * `greek` - Greek
 * `hebrew` - Hebrew
 * `hzgbsimplifiedchinese` - Simplified Chinese (HZGB)
 * `german` - German
 * `japaneseshiftjis` - Japanese (Shift-JIS)
 * `koi8-r` - KOI8-R
 * `koi8-u` - K0I8-U
 * `korean` - Korean
 * `thai` - Thai
 * `turkish` - Turkish
 * `unicodebigendian` - Unicode big endian
 * `unicodelittleendian` - Unicode little endian
 * `vietnamese` - Vietnamese

EndLineChar.description:
Set end of line character. The character which will be used to break lines.
 * `crlf` - CR+LF (Windows)
 * `cr` - CR (Windows)
 * `lfcr` - LFCR (Mac OS)
 * `lf` - LF (Mac OS)

SaveFormat.description:
Specifies the format to use when saving a document.
 * `wintext` - Windows Text
 * `wintextlb` - Windows Text with line breaks preserved
 * `dostext` - DOS text
 * `dostextlb` - DOS text with line breaks preserved
 * `unicodetext` - Unicode text format

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/docx/to/compare.summary: DOCX to COMPARE File Conversion API
/convert/docx/to/compare.description:
Compare Word documents for differences in content and formatting 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/docx-to-compare

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

CompareFile.description: Specifies the Word document with which the specified document is compared.

CompareLevel.description:
The property defines the granularity of comparisons between documents or text segments. It determines the precision of the comparison process, allowing users to specify whether differences are identified based on larger text blocks, such as words or sentences, or at a more detailed level, such as characters or formatting.
 * `Word` - Word
 * `Character` - Character

CompareFormatting.description: Determines whether to indicate variations in formatting between the two documents.

CompareCaseChanges.description: Determines whether to highlight discrepancies in capitalization between the two documents.

CompareWhitespace.description: Determines whether to identify dissimilarities in whitespace, such as gaps or paragraphs, between the two documents.

CompareTables.description: Determines whether to evaluate variations in the information presented within tables between the two documents.

CompareHeaders.description: Determines whether to contrast divergences in headers and footers between the two documents.

CompareFootnotes.description: Determines whether to compare differences in footnotes and endnotes between the two documents.

CompareTextboxes.description: Determines whether to assess differences in the information presented within text boxes between the two documents.

CompareFields.description: Determines whether to detect disparities in fields between the two documents.

CompareComments.description: Determines whether to evaluate distinctions in comments between the two documents.

CompareMoves.description: Indicates the name of the individual to credit for modifications when comparing the two documents.

AcceptRevisions.description: Specifies whether to accept revisions before document comparison.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/docx/to/png.summary: DOCX to PNG File Conversion API
/convert/docx/to/png.description:
The API for converting Word documents to PNG images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/docx-to-png

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

ImageResolution.description: Set output image resolution in dpi.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ImageHeight.description: Image height in pixels. If PreserveResolution property is set, render every page at set resolution and scale down to height if do not fit to resolution.

ImageWidth.description: Image width in pixels. If PreserveResolution property is set, render every page at set resolution and scale down to width if do not fit to resolution.

ImageAntialiasing.description: Control the use of text and graphics subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 8 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.

Rotate.description: Rotate image by angle.

TransparentColor.description: Add alpha channel to image, setting pixels matching color to transparent. Values accepted are RGBA, CMYK hex string, color name or RGB format like this 255,255,255 (RED=255, GREEN=255, BLUE=255) or 255,255,255,150 with alpha chanel.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--

/convert/docx/to/tiff.summary: DOCX to TIFF File Conversion API
/convert/docx/to/tiff.description:
The API for converting Word documents to Tiff images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/docx-to-tiff

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

PageSize.description:
Page size.
 * `default` - Default
 * `letter` - Letter
 * `lettersmall` - Letter Small
 * `tabloid` - Tabloid
 * `ledger` - Ledger
 * `legal` - Legal
 * `statement` - Statement
 * `executive` - Executive
 * `a3` - A3
 * `a4` - A4
 * `a4small` - A4 Small
 * `a5` - A5
 * `b4` - B4
 * `b5` - B5
 * `folio` - Folio
 * `quarto` - Quarto
 * `10x14` - 10 x 14 in.
 * `11x17` - 11 x 17 in.
 * `note` - Note
 * `envelope9` - Envelope #9
 * `envelope10` - Envelope #10
 * `envelope11` - Envelope #11
 * `envelope12` - Envelope #12
 * `envelope14` - Envelope #14
 * `csheet` - C size sheet
 * `dsheet` - D size sheet
 * `esheet` - E size sheet
 * `envelopedl` - Envelope DL
 * `envelopec3` - Envelope C3
 * `envelopec4` - Envelope C4
 * `envelopec5` - Envelope C5
 * `envelopec6` - Envelope C6
 * `envelopec65` - Envelope C65
 * `envelopecb4` - Envelope B4
 * `envelopeb5` - Envelope B5
 * `envelopeb6` - Envelope B6
 * `envelopeeurope` - Envelope Europe
 * `envelopem` - Envelope Monarch
 * `envelopeusa` - Envelope USA
 * `fanfoldusa` - U.S. Standard Fanfold
 * `fanfoldgerman` - German Standard Fanfold
 * `lfanfoldgerman` - German Legal Fanfold

TiffType.description:
Set TIFF type.
 * `color24nc` - Color - 24bits RGB output, uncompressed
 * `color32nc` - Color - 32bits CMYK output, uncompressed
 * `color24lzw` - Color - 24bits RGB, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color32lzw` - Color - 32bits CMYK, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color24zip` - Color - 24bits RGB, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `color32zip` - Color - 32bits CMYK, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `grayscale` - Grayscale - 8bits output, uncompressed
 * `grayscalelzw` - Grayscale - 8bits output, LZW-compatible compression
 * `grayscalezip` - Grayscale - 8bits output, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `monochromeg3` - Monochrome - G3 fax encoding with EOLs
 * `monochromeg32d` - Monochrome - 2-D G3 fax encoding
 * `monochromeg4` - Monochrome - G4 fax encoding
 * `monochromelzw` - Monochrome - LZW-compatible compression
 * `monochromepackbits` - Monochrome - PackBits compression

FillOrder.description:
The logical order of bits within a byte.
 * `0` - MSB-to-LSB
 * `1` - LSB-to-MSB

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/docx/to/txt.summary: DOCX to TXT File Conversion API
/convert/docx/to/txt.description:
The API for converting Word documents to Text files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/docx-to-txt

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

Substitutions.description: Replace similar symbols with their counterparts in a text file, such as a copyright symbol with (c).

LineBreaks.description: Inserts line breaks at the end of each line of text.

TextEncoding.description:
Specifies what encoding the parser should use when converting text files.
 * `auto` - Auto
 * `ascii` - ASCII
 * `utf-7` - UTF-7 encoding
 * `utf-8` - UTF-8 encoding
 * `iso-8859-1` - ISO-8859-1
 * `iso-8859-2` - ISO-8859-2
 * `iso-8859-6` - ISO-8859-6
 * `iso-8859-15` - ISO-8859-15
 * `windows-1252` - Windows-1252
 * `arabicasmo` - Arabic ASMO
 * `baltic` - Baltic
 * `centraleuropean` - Central European
 * `cyrillic` - Cyrillic
 * `europa` - Europa
 * `extalphalowercase` - Extended Alpha lowercase
 * `greek` - Greek
 * `hebrew` - Hebrew
 * `hzgbsimplifiedchinese` - Simplified Chinese (HZGB)
 * `german` - German
 * `japaneseshiftjis` - Japanese (Shift-JIS)
 * `koi8-r` - KOI8-R
 * `koi8-u` - K0I8-U
 * `korean` - Korean
 * `thai` - Thai
 * `turkish` - Turkish
 * `unicodebigendian` - Unicode big endian
 * `unicodelittleendian` - Unicode little endian
 * `vietnamese` - Vietnamese

EndLineChar.description:
Set end of line character. The character which will be used to break lines.
 * `crlf` - CR+LF (Windows)
 * `cr` - CR (Windows)
 * `lfcr` - LFCR (Mac OS)
 * `lf` - LF (Mac OS)

SaveFormat.description:
Specifies the format to use when saving a document.
 * `wintext` - Windows Text
 * `wintextlb` - Windows Text with line breaks preserved
 * `dostext` - DOS text
 * `dostextlb` - DOS text with line breaks preserved
 * `unicodetext` - Unicode text format

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

/convert/dwf/to/jpg.summary: DWF to JPG File Conversion API
/convert/dwf/to/jpg.description:
The API for converting AutoCAD drawing files to JPG images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/dwf-to-jpg

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

PageSize.description:
Page size.
 * `default` - Default
 * `letter` - Letter
 * `lettersmall` - Letter Small
 * `tabloid` - Tabloid
 * `ledger` - Ledger
 * `legal` - Legal
 * `statement` - Statement
 * `executive` - Executive
 * `a3` - A3
 * `a4` - A4
 * `a4small` - A4 Small
 * `a5` - A5
 * `b4` - B4
 * `b5` - B5
 * `folio` - Folio
 * `quarto` - Quarto
 * `10x14` - 10 x 14 in.
 * `11x17` - 11 x 17 in.
 * `note` - Note
 * `envelope9` - Envelope #9
 * `envelope10` - Envelope #10
 * `envelope11` - Envelope #11
 * `envelope12` - Envelope #12
 * `envelope14` - Envelope #14
 * `csheet` - C size sheet
 * `dsheet` - D size sheet
 * `esheet` - E size sheet
 * `envelopedl` - Envelope DL
 * `envelopec3` - Envelope C3
 * `envelopec4` - Envelope C4
 * `envelopec5` - Envelope C5
 * `envelopec6` - Envelope C6
 * `envelopec65` - Envelope C65
 * `envelopecb4` - Envelope B4
 * `envelopeb5` - Envelope B5
 * `envelopeb6` - Envelope B6
 * `envelopeeurope` - Envelope Europe
 * `envelopem` - Envelope Monarch
 * `envelopeusa` - Envelope USA
 * `fanfoldusa` - U.S. Standard Fanfold
 * `fanfoldgerman` - German Standard Fanfold
 * `lfanfoldgerman` - German Legal Fanfold

SpaceToConvert.description:
Set space type to convert.
 * `default` - Default
 * `all` - All layouts
 * `model` - Model space

CustomSpaceToConvert.description: Set custom layout name to convert by setting it name or index. This property overrides the SpaceToConvert property.

JpgType.description:
Set JPG type.
 * `jpeg` - RGB (Full Colors)
 * `jpegcmyk` - CMYK
 * `jpeggray` - Grayscale

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/dxf/to/pdf.description:
Convert AutoCAD drawing files to PDF files 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/dxf-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

SpaceToConvert.description:
Set space type to convert.
 * `default` - Default
 * `all` - All layouts
 * `model` - Model space

CustomSpaceToConvert.description: Set custom layout name to convert by setting it name or index. This property overrides the SpaceToConvert property.

AutoFit.description: The converted drawing is detected and adjusted to fit the current page size, with the possibility of changing the page orientation to accommodate the drawing.

PageOrientation.description:

TiffType.description:
Set TIFF type.
 * `color24nc` - Color - 24bits RGB output, uncompressed
 * `color32nc` - Color - 32bits CMYK output, uncompressed
 * `color24lzw` - Color - 24bits RGB, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color32lzw` - Color - 32bits CMYK, LZW-compatible compression

 * `grayscalelzw` - Grayscale - 8bits output, LZW-compatible compression

 * `monochromepackbits` - Monochrome - PackBits compression

FillOrder.description:

 * `1` - LSB-to-MSB

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.

 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

PersistAnimation.description: Read animation values AnimationIterations and AnimationDelay from GIF file. Only works if GIF file is added to file list.

AnimationDelay.description: Animation delay in milliseconds before playing the next image in an animated sequence.

AnimationIterations.description: Set the number of iterations to loop an animation. Zero is infinity.

/convert/heic/to/png.summary: HEIC to PNG File Conversion API

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ImageResolution.description: Set output image resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

TransparentColor.description: Add alpha channel to image, setting pixels matching color to transparent. Values accepted are RGBA, CMYK hex string, color name or RGB format like this 255,255,255 (RED=255, GREEN=255, BLUE=255) or 255,255,255,150 with alpha chanel.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f

Content-Type: application/octet-stream

/convert/htm/to/jpg.summary: HTM to JPG File Conversion API
/convert/htm/to/jpg.description:
The API for converting HTML files to JPG images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/htm-to-jpg

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ConversionDelay.description: Delay in seconds before page load and PDF creation. Sometimes useful to let web page fully load.

AuthUsername.description: HTTP authentication username. Could be used if conversion web page is protected with HTTP authentication.

AuthPassword.description: HTTP authentication password. Could be used if conversion web page is protected with HTTP authentication.

CookieConsentBlock.description: Tries to remove EU regulation required cookie warnings from web pages.

Cookies.description: Set additional cookies for the page request. Exaple: cookiename1=cookievalue1; cookiename2=cookievalue2; cookiename3=cookievalue3

JavaScript.description: Allow web pages to run JavaScript.

WaitElement.description: Element selector string of the DOM element. Converter will wait for this element to appear in DOM before conversion begins.

UserJs.description: Execute provided JavaScript before conversion begins.

UserCss.description: Apply additional CSS before conversion begins.

HideElements.description: Element selector string of the DOM elements that needs to be hidden during conversion.

CssMediaType.description: Use CSS media type in conversion process. The default screen and print media types are supported but not limited to these. The custom media type, like convertapi can be used too.

CropElement.description: Element selector string of the DOM element that should be converted. Element will be cropped from the document.

Zoom.description: Set the default zoom level of webpages.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/htm/to/pdf.summary: HTM to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/htm/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting HTML files to PDF files using Google Chrome browser. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/htm-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ConversionDelay.description: Delay in seconds before page load and PDF creation. Sometimes useful to let web page fully load.

AuthUsername.description: HTTP authentication username. Could be used if conversion web page is protected with HTTP authentication.

AuthPassword.description: HTTP authentication password. Could be used if conversion web page is protected with HTTP authentication.

CookieConsentBlock.description: Tries to remove EU regulation required cookie warnings from web pages.

Cookies.description: Set additional cookies for the page request. Exaple: cookiename1=cookievalue1; cookiename2=cookievalue2; cookiename3=cookievalue3

JavaScript.description: Allow web pages to run JavaScript.

WaitElement.description: Element selector string of the DOM element. Converter will wait for this element to appear in DOM before conversion begins.

UserJs.description: Execute provided JavaScript before conversion begins.

UserCss.description: Apply additional CSS before conversion begins.

HideElements.description: Element selector string of the DOM elements that needs to be hidden during conversion.

CssMediaType.description: Use CSS media type in conversion process. The default screen and print media types are supported but not limited to these. The custom media type, like convertapi can be used too.

LoadLazyContent.description: Load page images that loads only when they are visible.

RespectViewport.description: If true, the converter will generate PDF as the content looks like in the browser. If is set to false, the converter acts like Chrome print to PDF function.

Scale.description: Set web page scale value in percentage.

PageWidth.description: Custom page width in millimeters (mm). This option override PageSize option.

PageHeight.description: Custom page height in millimeters (mm). This option override PageSize option.

MarginTop.description: Set the page top margin in millimeters (mm).

MarginRight.description: Set the page right margin in millimeters (mm).

MarginBottom.description: Set the page bottom margin in millimeters (mm).

MarginLeft.description: Set the page left margin in millimeters (mm).

FixedElements.description:
Change fixed elements CSS 'position' property to adapt page for conversion.
 * `fixed` - Leave unchanged
 * `absolute` - Absolute
 * `relative` - Relative
 * `hide` - Hide

ShowElements.description: Element selector string of the DOM elements that should be visible during conversion. Other elements will be hidden.

AvoidBreakElements.description: CSS selector for the elements that pages should not break.

BreakBeforeElements.description: CSS selector for the elements that should apply page break before it.

BreakAfterElements.description: CSS selector for the elements that should apply page break after it.

CompressPDF.description: It tries to produce smaller output files but requires Adobe Reader 6, released in 2003 or newer, to view created PDF files.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

UnsupportedTags.description:

 * `Bypass` - Bypass unsupported tags but convert content
 * `Fail` - Fail and throw exception

PassThroughTags.description: Enter pass-through tags, separating them with commas. The tags will be copied to the MD document without processing. The UnsupportedTags property should be set to PassThrough.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ImageResolution.description: Set output image resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

AlphaColor.description: Set a color on the alpha (transparent) channel. Values accepted are RGBA, CMYK hex string, or a color name.

ColorSpace.description:
Set image color space.
 * `default` - Default
 * `rgb` - RGB
 * `srgb` - sRGB
 * `cmyk` - CMYK
 * `gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f

/convert/jpg/to/gif.summary: JPG to GIF File Conversion API
/convert/jpg/to/gif.description:
The API for converting JPG, PNG, and GIF images to single and animated GIF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/jpg-to-gif

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

Files.description: Files to be converted. Value can be URL or file content. If used in query or multipart content parameter must be suffixed with index e.g. Files[0], Files[1], Files[2]...

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ImageResolution.description: Set output image resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

PersistAnimation.description: Read animation values AnimationIterations and AnimationDelay from GIF file. Only works if GIF file is added to file list.

AnimationDelay.description: Animation delay in milliseconds before playing the next image in an animated sequence.

AnimationIterations.description: Set the number of iterations to loop an animation. Zero is infinity.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f

The API for converting images to PDF files.

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Rotate.description:
Rotate image by degree. Auto rotation using EXIF supported for TIFF and JPEG images.
 * `0` - Preserve original
 * `90` - 90
 * `180` - 180
 * `270` - 270
 * `auto` - Auto using EXIF

ColorSpace.description:
Set image color space.
 * `default` - Default
 * `rgb` - RGB
 * `srgb` - sRGB
 * `cmyk` - CMYK
 * `gray` - Gray

ColorProfile.description:
Set image color profile. Some profiles will override the ColorSpace property.
 * `default` - Default
 * `isocoatedv2` - ISO Coated v2

MarginHorizontal.description: Set the page horizontal margin in millimeters (mm).

MarginVertical.description: Set the page vertical margin in millimeters (mm).

PageSize.description:
The property scales each image to fit a given page size.
 * `default` - Image size
 * `a0` - A0
 * `a1` - A1
 * `a2` - A2
 * `a3` - A3
 * `a4` - A4
 * `a5` - A5
 * `a6` - A6
 * `a7` - A7
 * `a8` - A8
 * `a9` - A9
 * `a10` - A10
 * `letter` - Letter
 * `legal` - Legal

PageOrientation.description:
Set page orientation. Works only with the PageSize property when it is set to a value other than the Image size.
 * `default` - Image orientation
 * `portrait` - Portrait
 * `landscape` - Landscape

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

Watermark JPG image. Stamp a JPG with the text. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/jpg-to-watermark

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

FontName.description:
Specifies the watermark font name. Contact us if you are looking for a specific font for a watermark that is missing from the list.
 * `Arial` - Arial
 * `Bahnschrift` - Bahnschrift
 * `Calibri` - Calibri
 * `Cambria` - Cambria
 * `Consolas` - Consolas
 * `Constantia` - Constantia
 * `Courier New` - Courier New
 * `Georgia` - Georgia
 * `Tahoma` - Tahoma
 * `Times New Roman` - Times New Roman
 * `Verdana` - Verdana

FontEmbed.description: Specifies whether fonts should be embedded.

FontSubset.description: Specifies whether fonts should be subset.

TextRenderingMode.description:
Specifies the text rendering mode.
 * `filltext` - fill text without stroke
 * `stroketext` - stroke text without fill
 * `fillstroke` - fill and stroke
 * `invisible` - invisible

Rotate.description: Specifies the watermark rotation angle in degrees.

HorizontalAlignment.description:
Specifies the horizontal watermark alignment.
 * `left` - left
 * `center` - center
 * `right` - right

VerticalAlignment.description:
Specifies the vertical watermark alignment.
 * `top` - top
 * `center` - center
 * `bottom` - bottom

PositionX.description: Specifies the watermark X coordinate. If set overrides property HorizontalAlignment.

PositionY.description: Specifies the watermark Y coordinate. If set overrides property VerticalAlignment.

PositionUnit.description:
Specifies measurement unit to use for the PositionX and PositionY properties.
 * `pt` - points
 * `in` - inches
 * `mm` - millimeters
 * `cm` - centimeters

/convert/log/to/txt.description:
The API for converting Word documents to Text files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/log-to-txt

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

Substitutions.description: Replace similar symbols with their counterparts in a text file, such as a copyright symbol with (c).

LineBreaks.description: Inserts line breaks at the end of each line of text.

TextEncoding.description:
Specifies what encoding the parser should use when converting text files.
 * `auto` - Auto
 * `ascii` - ASCII
 * `utf-7` - UTF-7 encoding
 * `utf-8` - UTF-8 encoding
 * `iso-8859-1` - ISO-8859-1
 * `iso-8859-2` - ISO-8859-2
 * `iso-8859-6` - ISO-8859-6
 * `iso-8859-15` - ISO-8859-15
 * `windows-1252` - Windows-1252
 * `arabicasmo` - Arabic ASMO
 * `baltic` - Baltic
 * `centraleuropean` - Central European
 * `cyrillic` - Cyrillic
 * `europa` - Europa
 * `extalphalowercase` - Extended Alpha lowercase
 * `greek` - Greek
 * `hebrew` - Hebrew
 * `hzgbsimplifiedchinese` - Simplified Chinese (HZGB)
 * `german` - German
 * `japaneseshiftjis` - Japanese (Shift-JIS)
 * `koi8-r` - KOI8-R
 * `koi8-u` - K0I8-U
 * `korean` - Korean
 * `thai` - Thai
 * `turkish` - Turkish
 * `unicodebigendian` - Unicode big endian
 * `unicodelittleendian` - Unicode little endian
 * `vietnamese` - Vietnamese

EndLineChar.description:
Set end of line character. The character which will be used to break lines.
 * `crlf` - CR+LF (Windows)
 * `cr` - CR (Windows)
 * `lfcr` - LFCR (Mac OS)
 * `lf` - LF (Mac OS)

SaveFormat.description:
Specifies the format to use when saving a document.
 * `wintext` - Windows Text
 * `wintextlb` - Windows Text with line breaks preserved
 * `dostext` - DOS text
 * `dostextlb` - DOS text with line breaks preserved
 * `unicodetext` - Unicode text format

/convert/mdi/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting images to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/mdi-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Rotate.description:
Rotate image by degree. Auto rotation using EXIF supported for TIFF and JPEG images.
 * `0` - Preserve original
 * `90` - 90
 * `180` - 180
 * `270` - 270
 * `auto` - Auto using EXIF

ColorSpace.description:
Set image color space.
 * `default` - Default
 * `rgb` - RGB
 * `srgb` - sRGB
 * `cmyk` - CMYK
 * `gray` - Gray

ColorProfile.description:
Set image color profile. Some profiles will override the ColorSpace property.
 * `default` - Default
 * `isocoatedv2` - ISO Coated v2

MarginHorizontal.description: Set the page horizontal margin in millimeters (mm).

MarginVertical.description: Set the page vertical margin in millimeters (mm).

PageSize.description:
The property scales each image to fit a given page size.
 * `default` - Image size
 * `a0` - A0
 * `a1` - A1
 * `a2` - A2
 * `a3` - A3
 * `a4` - A4
 * `a5` - A5
 * `a6` - A6
 * `a7` - A7
 * `a8` - A8
 * `a9` - A9
 * `a10` - A10
 * `letter` - Letter
 * `legal` - Legal

PageOrientation.description:
Set page orientation. Works only with the PageSize property when it is set to a value other than the Image size.
 * `default` - Image orientation
 * `portrait` - Portrait
 * `landscape` - Landscape

/convert/mobi/to/jpg.summary: MOBI to JPG File Conversion API
/convert/mobi/to/jpg.description:
The API for converting electronic books (e-book) to JPG images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/mobi-to-jpg

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

JpgType.description:
Set JPG type.
 * `jpeg` - RGB (Full Colors)
 * `jpegcmyk` - CMYK
 * `jpeggray` - Grayscale

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/mobi/to/pdf.summary: MOBI to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/mobi/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting electronic books (e-book) to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/mobi-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

PdfVersion.description:
Set PDF version.
 * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2)
 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)
 * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6)
 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)
 * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3)
 * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%
 * `400` - 400%
 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/msg/to/png.summary: MSG to PNG File Conversion API
/convert/msg/to/png.description:
The API for converting email files to PNG images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/msg-to-png

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

 * `color32zip` - Color - 32bits CMYK, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `grayscale` - Grayscale - 8bits output, uncompressed
 * `grayscalelzw` - Grayscale - 8bits output, LZW-compatible compression

 * `monochromeg3` - Monochrome - G3 fax encoding with EOLs
 * `monochromeg32d` - Monochrome - 2-D G3 fax encoding
 * `monochromeg4` - Monochrome - G4 fax encoding
 * `monochromelzw` - Monochrome - LZW-compatible compression
 * `monochromepackbits` - Monochrome - PackBits compression

The API for converting Word documents to Text files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/odt-to-txt

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

Substitutions.description: Replace similar symbols with their counterparts in a text file, such as a copyright symbol with (c).

LineBreaks.description: Inserts line breaks at the end of each line of text.

TextEncoding.description:
Specifies what encoding the parser should use when converting text files.
 * `auto` - Auto
 * `ascii` - ASCII
 * `utf-7` - UTF-7 encoding
 * `utf-8` - UTF-8 encoding
 * `iso-8859-1` - ISO-8859-1
 * `iso-8859-2` - ISO-8859-2
 * `iso-8859-6` - ISO-8859-6
 * `iso-8859-15` - ISO-8859-15
 * `windows-1252` - Windows-1252
 * `arabicasmo` - Arabic ASMO
 * `baltic` - Baltic
 * `centraleuropean` - Central European
 * `cyrillic` - Cyrillic
 * `europa` - Europa
 * `extalphalowercase` - Extended Alpha lowercase
 * `greek` - Greek
 * `hebrew` - Hebrew
 * `hzgbsimplifiedchinese` - Simplified Chinese (HZGB)
 * `german` - German
 * `japaneseshiftjis` - Japanese (Shift-JIS)
 * `koi8-r` - KOI8-R
 * `koi8-u` - K0I8-U
 * `korean` - Korean
 * `thai` - Thai
 * `turkish` - Turkish
 * `unicodebigendian` - Unicode big endian
 * `unicodelittleendian` - Unicode little endian
 * `vietnamese` - Vietnamese

EndLineChar.description:
Set end of line character. The character which will be used to break lines.
 * `crlf` - CR+LF (Windows)
 * `cr` - CR (Windows)
 * `lfcr` - LFCR (Mac OS)
 * `lf` - LF (Mac OS)

SaveFormat.description:
Specifies the format to use when saving a document.
 * `wintext` - Windows Text
 * `wintextlb` - Windows Text with line breaks preserved
 * `dostext` - DOS text
 * `dostextlb` - DOS text with line breaks preserved
 * `unicodetext` - Unicode text format

/convert/oxps/to/pdf.summary: OXPS to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/oxps/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting XPS documents to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/oxps-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

DetectPageSize.description: Detect and convert custom page sizes.

PdfVersion.description:
Set PDF version.
 * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2)
 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)
 * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6)
 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)
 * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3)
 * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%
 * `400` - 400%
 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/oxps/to/webp.summary: OXPS to WEBP File Conversion API
/convert/oxps/to/webp.description:
The API for converting XPS documents to WEBP images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/oxps-to-webp

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

DetectPageSize.description: Detect and convert custom page sizes.

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/pdf/to/compress.summary: PDF to COMPRESS File Conversion API
/convert/pdf/to/compress.description:
Compress and reduce a PDF file size by up to 90% 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/pdf-to-compress

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

Presets.description:
Choose compression level from presets. If preset is selected all other compression options are ignored.
 * `none` - Not set - advanced properties used
 * `text` - Text - 20 image DPI, lowest quality, highest compression
 * `archive` - Archive - 40 image DPI, low quality, high compression
 * `web` - Web - 75 image DPI, medium quality, high compression
 * `ebook` - Ebook - 150 image DPI, high quality, medium compression
 * `printer` - Printer - 300 image DPI, high quality, low compression

ColorImageCompression.description:
Color image compression algorithm.
 * `none` - Image will be left uncompressed
 * `jpg` - JPEG compression
 * `jpx` - JPEG2000 compression (Acrobat 6/PDF v1.5 and later)
 * `zip` - Deflate ZIP compression

ColorImageQuality.description: Color image compression quality. The parameter applies only to JPX and JPG compressions.

ColorImageDownsample.description: Enable Bicubic image downsampling and decreases the number of pixels in the color image which in turn makes the file smaller.

ColorImageThresholdDpi.description: Threshold in DPI to activate color images resampling. ColorImageDownsample property must be enabled.

ColorImageResampleDpi.description: Color image resolution in DPI after Bicubic resampling. ColorImageDownsample property must be enabled.

GrayscaleImageCompression.description:
Grayscale image compression algorithm.
 * `none` - Image will be left uncompressed
 * `jpg` - JPEG compression
 * `jpx` - JPEG2000 compression (Acrobat 6/PDF v1.5 and later)
 * `zip` - Deflate ZIP compression

GrayscaleImageQuality.description: Grayscale image compression quality. The parameter applies only to JPX and JPG compressions.

GrayscaleImageDownsample.description: Enable Bicubic image downsampling and decreases the number of pixels in the grayscale image which in turn makes the file smaller.

GrayscaleImageThresholdDpi.description: Threshold in DPI to activate grayscale images resampling. GrayscaleImageDownsample property must be enabled.

GrayscaleImageResampleDpi.description: Grayscale image resolution in DPI after Bicubic resampling. GrayscaleImageDownsample property must be enabled.

MonochromeImageCompression.description:
Monochrome image compression algorithm.
 * `none` - Image will be left uncompressed
 * `jbig2` - JBIG2 lossy compression (Acrobat 5/PDF v1.4 and later)
 * `jbig2l` - JBIG2 lossless compression (Acrobat 5/PDF v1.4 and later)
 * `fax` - Group 4 CCITT facsimile/fax compression
 * `zip` - Deflate ZIP compression

MonochromeImageQuality.description: Monochrome image compression quality. The parameter applies only to jbig2 and jbig2l compressions.

MonochromeImageDownsample.description: Enable Bicubic image downsampling and decreases the number of pixels in the monochrome image which in turn makes the file smaller.

MonochromeImageThresholdDpi.description: Threshold in DPI to activate Monochrome images resampling. MonochromeImageDownsample property must be enabled.

MonochromeImageResampleDpi.description: Monochrome image resolution in DPI after Bicubic resampling. MonochromeImageDownsample property must be enabled.

UnembedBaseFonts.description: Specifies whether to remove the base fonts from the PDF file.

SubsetEmbeddedFonts.description: Output PDF should only contain font characters utilized in the original document, and any unused glyphs from all fonts in the document should be removed.

RemoveBookmarks.description: Remove bookmarks from the PDF file.

RemoveAnnotations.description: Remove text annotations from the PDF file.

RemoveForms.description: Remove PDF forms from the PDF file.

RemovePageLabels.description: Remove page labels from the PDF file.

RemoveLayers.description: Removes hidden layers and flatten visible ones.

RemoveArticleThreads.description: Remove article threads from the PDF file.

RemoveTaggedInfo.description: Remove tagged information from the PDF file.

RemovePageThumbnails.description: Remove page thumbnails from the PDF file.

RemoveDuplicates.description: Remove duplicate fonts and color profiles from the PDF file.

RemoveAlternateImages.description: Removes alternate images and leave only the one for on-screen viewing.

RemoveNamedDestinations.description: Remove named destinations from the PDF file.

RemoveEmbeddedFiles.description: Remove embedded/attachments files from the PDF file.

RemovePieceInformation.description: Remove piece information dictionaries like Adobe Illustrator or Photoshop private data.

CreateObjectStreams.description: Create object streams in the PDF file. An object stream represents a stream that contains a sequence of PDF objects. This allows a greater number of PDF objects to be compressed. Property compatible with Acrobat 6/PDF v1.5 and later.

Optimize.description: Optimize page content streams in the PDF file.

LzwToFlate.description: In streams that use LZW encoding, use Flate instead.

Linearize.description: Linearize PDF file and optimize for fast Web View.

PreservePdfa.description: Preserve the PDF/A standard in the PDF file.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

EnableOcr.description:
Enable optical character recognition(OCR). Set the property to ALL to perform OCR on all pages and Scanned to perform OCR on scanned pages if PDF contains mixed pages - text and image pages.
 * `Scanned` - Scanned Only
 * `All` - All Pages

 * `es` - Spanish
 * `en` - English
 * `he` - Hebrew
 * `pl` - Polish
 * `pt` - Portuguese
 * `ru` - Russian
 * `sv` - Swedish
 * `tr` - Turkish
 * `lt` - Lithuanian

/convert/pdf/to/merge.summary: PDF to MERGE File Conversion API
/convert/pdf/to/merge.description:
Merge multiple PDF files into single document 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/pdf-to-merge

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

Files.description: Files to be converted. Value can be URL or file content. If used in query or multipart content parameter must be suffixed with index e.g. Files[0], Files[1], Files[2]...

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

RetainNumbering.description: Keeps the original PDF labels numbering rather than re-numbering merged PDF from the 1 page.

RemoveDuplicateFonts.description: Do not include the same fonts from source PDFs while merging.

BookmarksToc.description:
Adds a top-level bookmark for each file, using the filename or PDF title from metadata.
 * `disabled` - Disabled
 * `filename` - File Name
 * `title` - Title

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

PageSize.description:
The property scales each page to fit a given page size.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

PdfVersion.description:
Set PDF version.
 * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2)
 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)
 * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6)
 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)
 * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3)
 * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%
 * `400` - 400%
 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray
