/convert/pdf/to/protect.summary: PDF to PROTECT File Conversion API
/convert/pdf/to/protect.description:
Protect and encrypt PDF documents securing with a password 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/pdf-to-protect

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

EncryptionAlgorithm.description:
Sets the encryption algorithm.
 * `Standard40Bit` - 40-bit RC4 algorithm. Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.1) and above
 * `Standard128Bit` - 128-bit RC4 algorithm. Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4) and above
 * `Aes128Bit` - 128-bit AES algorithm. Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6) and above
 * `Aes256Bit` - 256-bit AES algorithm. PDF 2.0

UserPassword.description: Sets the user password (also known as a document open password) in the output PDF document. Users will be asked to enter this password before Acrobat Reader allows them to view the PDF document.

OwnerPassword.description: Sets owner password (also known as a permissions password). Using a owner password, you can restrict printing, editing, and copying content in the PDF. Recipients dont need a password to open the document. They do need a password to change the restrictions the owner set.

RespectOwnerPassword.description: Enable the property if you want to respect the document's owner password and permissions. If disabled - the old owner's password and permissions will be removed by default. Setting this property requires you to enter the correct owner's password into the Password property for protected documents.

PreservePermissions.description: Enable the property if you want to keep the document permissions unchanged. It requires you to specify the OwnerPassword. If enabled, the document permission properties will be ignored.

AllowEverything.description: Enable or disable all permissions. The specific permissions listed below overrides this property.

AssembleDocument.description: Enable or disable assembly of the document - insert, rotate, or delete pages and create bookmarks or thumbnail images.

CopyContents.description: Enable or disable copy or extract text and graphics from the document.

ModifyContents.description: Enable or disable changing the contents of the document.

ExtractContents.description: Enable or disable extract text and graphics.

ModifyAnnotations.description: Enable or disable adding or modifying text annotations and fill in interactive form fields.

FillFormFields.description: Enable or disable fill-in existing interactive form fields, including signature fields.

PrintFaithfulCopy.description: Enable or disable printing of the document to a representation from which a faithful digital copy of the PDF content could be generated.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/pdf/to/split.summary: PDF to SPLIT File Conversion API
/convert/pdf/to/split.description:
Split PDF files into pages and save them in individual PDF. Extract pages from a PDF to create a new PDF Document. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/pdf-to-split

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

SplitByPattern.description: Split PDF into chunks of pages by a pattern. For example, if you set 3,2 for a ten-page PDF, it would be divided into four PDF files that contain 3,2,3,2 pages accordingly. The pattern is repeated until there are no pages left.

SplitByCustomRange.description: Split PDF by a custom range. Individual page numbers separated by commas or page ranges are supported and can be combined. For example, if set 1,3,4-5,6-9 for a ten-page PDF, it would create four PDF documents - the first PDF contains only the first page, the second PDF contains the third page, the third PDF contains pages from 3 to 5, and the last PDF contains pages from 6 to 9.

ExtractPages.description: Each page included in this range will be split individually (one page per document). A page range or individual page numbers separated by a comma is supported (see SplitByCustomRange description for a detailed explanation).

MergeRanges.description: Merge all ranges in one PDF file.

CompressPDF.description: It tries to produce smaller output files but requires Adobe Reader 6, released in 2003 or newer, to view created PDF files.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

TiffType.description:
Set TIFF type.
 * `color24nc` - Color - 24bits RGB output, uncompressed
 * `color32nc` - Color - 32bits CMYK output, uncompressed
 * `color24lzw` - Color - 24bits RGB, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color32lzw` - Color - 32bits CMYK, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color24zip` - Color - 24bits RGB, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `color32zip` - Color - 32bits CMYK, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `grayscale` - Grayscale - 8bits output, uncompressed
 * `grayscalelzw` - Grayscale - 8bits output, LZW-compatible compression
 * `grayscalezip` - Grayscale - 8bits output, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `monochromeg3` - Monochrome - G3 fax encoding with EOLs
 * `monochromeg32d` - Monochrome - 2-D G3 fax encoding
 * `monochromeg4` - Monochrome - G4 fax encoding
 * `monochromelzw` - Monochrome - LZW-compatible compression
 * `monochromepackbits` - Monochrome - PackBits compression

FillOrder.description:
The logical order of bits within a byte.
 * `0` - MSB-to-LSB
 * `1` - LSB-to-MSB

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

 * `2482` - 2482 pixels (12.2 in)

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

DitheringMethod.description:
Specifies the dithering algorithm.
 * `default` - Default
 * `sierra` - Sierra
 * `burkes` - Burkes
 * `stucki` - Stucki
 * `floyd` - Floyd
 * `jarvis` - Jarvis
 * `cluster6` - Cluster 6x6
 * `cluster8` - Cluster 8x8
 * `cluster16` - Cluster 16x16
 * `bayer4` - Bayer 4x4
 * `bayer8` - Bayer 8x8

Wts.description: Use Well Tempered Screening algorithm for halftoning.

TiffType.description:
Set TIFF FAX type.
 * `monochromeg3` - Monochrome - G3 fax encoding with EOLs
 * `monochromeg32d` - Monochrome - 2-D G3 fax encoding
 * `monochromeg4` - Monochrome - G4 fax encoding
 * `monochromelzw` - Monochrome - LZW-compatible compression
 * `monochromepackbits` - Monochrome - PackBits compression

FillOrder.description:
The logical order of bits within a byte.
 * `0` - MSB-to-LSB
 * `1` - LSB-to-MSB

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

FontName.description:
Specifies the watermark font name. Contact us if you are looking for a specific font for a watermark that is missing from the list.
 * `Arial` - Arial
 * `Bahnschrift` - Bahnschrift
 * `Calibri` - Calibri
 * `Cambria` - Cambria
 * `Consolas` - Consolas
 * `Constantia` - Constantia
 * `Courier New` - Courier New
 * `Georgia` - Georgia
 * `Tahoma` - Tahoma
 * `Times New Roman` - Times New Roman
 * `Verdana` - Verdana

FontEmbed.description: Specifies whether fonts should be embedded.

FontSubset.description: Specifies whether fonts should be subset.

TextRenderingMode.description:
Specifies the text rendering mode.
 * `filltext` - fill text without stroke
 * `stroketext` - stroke text without fill
 * `fillstroke` - fill and stroke
 * `invisible` - invisible

Rotate.description: Specifies the watermark rotation angle in degrees.

Style.description:
Specifies watermark style, stamp or watermark. The stamp is placed over page content and watermark under page content.
 * `stamp` - stamp
 * `watermark` - watermark

GoToLink.description: Specifies the web address to go when the watermark is clicked.

GoToPage.description: Specifies the page number to go when the watermark is clicked.

PageRotation.description: Specifies whether to use the page rotation parameter when placing watermark.

CropBox.description: Specifies whether to use the page crop box to position watermark.

HorizontalAlignment.description:

 * `center` - center
 * `right` - right

VerticalAlignment.description:
Specifies the vertical watermark alignment.
 * `top` - top
 * `center` - center
 * `bottom` - bottom

PositionX.description: Specifies the watermark X coordinate. If set overrides property HorizontalAlignment.

PositionY.description: Specifies the watermark Y coordinate. If set overrides property VerticalAlignment.

PositionUnit.description:
Specifies measurement unit to use for the PositionX and PositionY properties.
 * `pt` - points
 * `in` - inches
 * `mm` - millimeters
 * `cm` - centimeters

PdfVersion.description:
Set PDF version.
 * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2)
 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)

 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)
 * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3)
 * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%
 * `400` - 400%
 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

PersistAnimation.description: Read animation values AnimationIterations and AnimationDelay from GIF file. Only works if GIF file is added to file list.

AnimationDelay.description: Animation delay in milliseconds before playing the next image in an animated sequence.

AnimationIterations.description: Set the number of iterations to loop an animation. Zero is infinity.

/convert/png/to/jpg.description:
The API for converting images to JPG files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/png-to-jpg

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ImageResolution.description: Set output image resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

AlphaColor.description: Set a color on the alpha (transparent) channel. Values accepted are RGBA, CMYK hex string, or a color name.

ColorSpace.description:
Set image color space.
 * `default` - Default
 * `rgb` - RGB
 * `srgb` - sRGB
 * `cmyk` - CMYK
 * `gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/png/to/pdf.summary: PNG to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/png/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting images to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/png-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Rotate.description:
Rotate image by degree. Auto rotation using EXIF supported for TIFF and JPEG images.
 * `0` - Preserve original
 * `90` - 90
 * `180` - 180
 * `270` - 270
 * `auto` - Auto using EXIF

ColorSpace.description:
Set image color space.
 * `default` - Default
 * `rgb` - RGB
 * `srgb` - sRGB
 * `cmyk` - CMYK
 * `gray` - Gray

ColorProfile.description:
Set image color profile. Some profiles will override the ColorSpace property.
 * `default` - Default
 * `isocoatedv2` - ISO Coated v2

MarginHorizontal.description: Set the page horizontal margin in millimeters (mm).

MarginVertical.description: Set the page vertical margin in millimeters (mm).

PageSize.description:
The property scales each image to fit a given page size.
 * `default` - Image size
 * `a0` - A0
 * `a1` - A1
 * `a2` - A2
 * `a3` - A3
 * `a4` - A4
 * `a5` - A5
 * `a6` - A6
 * `a7` - A7
 * `a8` - A8
 * `a9` - A9
 * `a10` - A10
 * `letter` - Letter
 * `legal` - Legal

PageOrientation.description:
Set page orientation. Works only with the PageSize property when it is set to a value other than the Image size.
 * `default` - Image orientation
 * `portrait` - Portrait
 * `landscape` - Landscape

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/png/to/png.summary: PNG to PNG File Conversion API
/convert/png/to/png.description:
The API for converting images to Portable Network Graphic (PNG) images. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/png-to-png

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ImageResolution.description: Set output image resolution in dpi.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

TransparentColor.description: Add alpha channel to image, setting pixels matching color to transparent. Values accepted are RGBA, CMYK hex string, color name or RGB format like this 255,255,255 (RED=255, GREEN=255, BLUE=255) or 255,255,255,150 with alpha chanel.

/convert/png/to/watermark.summary: PNG to WATERMARK File Conversion API
/convert/png/to/watermark.description:
Watermark PNG image. Stamp a PNG with the text. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/png-to-watermark

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

FontName.description:
Specifies the watermark font name. Contact us if you are looking for a specific font for a watermark that is missing from the list.
 * `Arial` - Arial
 * `Bahnschrift` - Bahnschrift
 * `Calibri` - Calibri
 * `Cambria` - Cambria
 * `Consolas` - Consolas
 * `Constantia` - Constantia
 * `Courier New` - Courier New
 * `Georgia` - Georgia
 * `Tahoma` - Tahoma
 * `Times New Roman` - Times New Roman
 * `Verdana` - Verdana

FontEmbed.description: Specifies whether fonts should be embedded.

FontSubset.description: Specifies whether fonts should be subset.

TextRenderingMode.description:
Specifies the text rendering mode.
 * `filltext` - fill text without stroke
 * `stroketext` - stroke text without fill
 * `fillstroke` - fill and stroke
 * `invisible` - invisible

Rotate.description: Specifies the watermark rotation angle in degrees.

HorizontalAlignment.description:
Specifies the horizontal watermark alignment.
 * `left` - left
 * `center` - center
 * `right` - right

VerticalAlignment.description:
Specifies the vertical watermark alignment.
 * `top` - top
 * `center` - center
 * `bottom` - bottom

PositionX.description: Specifies the watermark X coordinate. If set overrides property HorizontalAlignment.

PositionY.description: Specifies the watermark Y coordinate. If set overrides property VerticalAlignment.

PositionUnit.description:
Specifies measurement unit to use for the PositionX and PositionY properties.
 * `pt` - points
 * `in` - inches
 * `mm` - millimeters
 * `cm` - centimeters

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/potx/to/jpg.summary: POTX to JPG File Conversion API
/convert/potx/to/jpg.description:
The API for converting PowerPoint presentation to JPG image. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/potx-to-jpg

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

JpgType.description:
Set JPG type.
 * `jpeg` - RGB (Full Colors)
 * `jpegcmyk` - CMYK
 * `jpeggray` - Grayscale

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/potx/to/tiff.summary: POTX to TIFF File Conversion API
/convert/potx/to/tiff.description:
The API for converting PowerPoint presentation to TIFF image. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/potx-to-tiff

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

TiffType.description:
Set TIFF type.
 * `color24nc` - Color - 24bits RGB output, uncompressed
 * `color32nc` - Color - 32bits CMYK output, uncompressed
 * `color24lzw` - Color - 24bits RGB, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color32lzw` - Color - 32bits CMYK, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color24zip` - Color - 24bits RGB, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `color32zip` - Color - 32bits CMYK, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `grayscale` - Grayscale - 8bits output, uncompressed
 * `grayscalelzw` - Grayscale - 8bits output, LZW-compatible compression
 * `grayscalezip` - Grayscale - 8bits output, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `monochromeg3` - Monochrome - G3 fax encoding with EOLs
 * `monochromeg32d` - Monochrome - 2-D G3 fax encoding
 * `monochromeg4` - Monochrome - G4 fax encoding
 * `monochromelzw` - Monochrome - LZW-compatible compression
 * `monochromepackbits` - Monochrome - PackBits compression

FillOrder.description:
The logical order of bits within a byte.
 * `0` - MSB-to-LSB
 * `1` - LSB-to-MSB

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--

/convert/prn/to/pdf.summary: PRN to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/prn/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting PostScript to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/prn-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

PdfVersion.description:
Set PDF version.
 * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2)
 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)
 * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6)
 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)
 * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3)
 * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%
 * `400` - 400%
 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f

Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

/convert/ps/to/pdf.summary: PS to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/ps/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting PostScript to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/ps-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

PdfVersion.description:
Set PDF version.
 * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2)
 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)
 * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6)
 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)
 * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3)
 * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%
 * `400` - 400%
 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--

/convert/pub/to/pdf.summary: PUB to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/pub/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting Publisher documents to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/pub-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

ConvertMetadata.description: Convert document metadata like Title, Author, Keywords to PDF metadata.

PdfVersion.description:
Set PDF version.
 * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2)
 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)
 * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6)
 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)
 * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3)
 * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%
 * `400` - 400%
 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

Specifies what encoding the parser should use when converting text files.
 * `auto` - Auto
 * `ascii` - ASCII
 * `utf-7` - UTF-7 encoding
 * `utf-8` - UTF-8 encoding
 * `iso-8859-1` - ISO-8859-1
 * `iso-8859-2` - ISO-8859-2
 * `iso-8859-6` - ISO-8859-6
 * `iso-8859-15` - ISO-8859-15
 * `windows-1252` - Windows-1252
 * `arabicasmo` - Arabic ASMO
 * `baltic` - Baltic
 * `centraleuropean` - Central European
 * `cyrillic` - Cyrillic
 * `europa` - Europa
 * `extalphalowercase` - Extended Alpha lowercase
 * `greek` - Greek
 * `hebrew` - Hebrew
 * `hzgbsimplifiedchinese` - Simplified Chinese (HZGB)
 * `german` - German

 * `turkish` - Turkish
 * `unicodebigendian` - Unicode big endian
 * `unicodelittleendian` - Unicode little endian
 * `vietnamese` - Vietnamese

EndLineChar.description:

 * `lfcr` - LFCR (Mac OS)
 * `lf` - LF (Mac OS)

SaveFormat.description:

 * `wintextlb` - Windows Text with line breaks preserved
 * `dostext` - DOS text

 * `unicodetext` - Unicode text format

/convert/tiff/to/pdf.summary: TIFF to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/tiff/to/pdf.description:
Convert TIFF images to PDF files 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/tiff-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Rotate.description:
Rotate image by degree. Auto rotation using EXIF supported for TIFF and JPEG images.
 * `0` - Preserve original
 * `90` - 90
 * `180` - 180
 * `270` - 270
 * `auto` - Auto using EXIF

ColorProfile.description:
Set image color profile. Some profiles will override the ColorSpace property.
 * `default` - Default
 * `isocoatedv2` - ISO Coated v2

MarginHorizontal.description: Set the page horizontal margin in millimeters (mm).

MarginVertical.description: Set the page vertical margin in millimeters (mm).

PageSize.description:
The property scales each image to fit a given page size.
 * `default` - Image size
 * `a0` - A0
 * `a1` - A1
 * `a2` - A2
 * `a3` - A3
 * `a4` - A4
 * `a5` - A5
 * `a6` - A6
 * `a7` - A7
 * `a8` - A8
 * `a9` - A9
 * `a10` - A10
 * `letter` - Letter
 * `legal` - Legal

PageOrientation.description:
Set page orientation. Works only with the PageSize property when it is set to a value other than the Image size.
 * `default` - Image orientation
 * `portrait` - Portrait
 * `landscape` - Landscape

AlphaChannel.description: Enable or disable the alpha channel if available.

ColorSpace.description:
Set image color space.
 * `default` - Default
 * `rgb` - RGB
 * `srgb` - sRGB
 * `cmyk` - CMYK
 * `gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

multipart/mixed.example:
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f
ConversionCost: 1
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="my_file.pdf"; size=8475

--FILE CONTENT--
--43cf1475-ab15-4c6b-b5ee-e2cbcedfe92f--

/convert/vsd/to/pdf.summary: VSD to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/vsd/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting Visio documents to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/vsd-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

Password.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.

ColorAsBlack.description: Render all colors in the converting document as black.

ConvertMetadata.description: Convert document metadata like Title, Author, Keywords to PDF metadata.

PdfVersion.description:
Set PDF version.
 * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2)
 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)
 * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6)
 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)
 * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3)
 * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%
 * `400` - 400%
 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

AuthUsername.description: HTTP authentication username. Could be used if conversion web page is protected with HTTP authentication.

JavaScript.description: Allow web pages to run JavaScript.

UserJs.description: Execute provided JavaScript before conversion begins.

UserCss.description: Apply additional CSS before conversion begins.

HideElements.description: Element selector string of the DOM elements that needs to be hidden during conversion.

Zoom.description: Set the default zoom level of webpages.

ClearPrintArea.description: Clear the print area in the converting document.

Scale.description: Set content scale value in percentage.

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:

 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

TiffType.description:
Set TIFF type.
 * `color24nc` - Color - 24bits RGB output, uncompressed
 * `color32nc` - Color - 32bits CMYK output, uncompressed
 * `color24lzw` - Color - 24bits RGB, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color32lzw` - Color - 32bits CMYK, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color24zip` - Color - 24bits RGB, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `color32zip` - Color - 32bits CMYK, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `grayscale` - Grayscale - 8bits output, uncompressed
 * `grayscalelzw` - Grayscale - 8bits output, LZW-compatible compression
 * `grayscalezip` - Grayscale - 8bits output, ZIP (Deflate) compression
 * `monochromeg3` - Monochrome - G3 fax encoding with EOLs
 * `monochromeg32d` - Monochrome - 2-D G3 fax encoding
 * `monochromeg4` - Monochrome - G4 fax encoding
 * `monochromelzw` - Monochrome - LZW-compatible compression
 * `monochromepackbits` - Monochrome - PackBits compression

FillOrder.description:
The logical order of bits within a byte.
 * `0` - MSB-to-LSB
 * `1` - LSB-to-MSB

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:

 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

 * `lfanfoldgerman` - German Legal Fanfold

ClearPrintArea.description: Clear the print area in the converting document.

Scale.description: Set content scale value in percentage.

ImageResolutionH.description: Set output image horizontal resolution in dpi.

ImageResolutionV.description: Set output image vertical resolution in dpi.

ScaleImage.description: Scale the output image. If ScaleImage is False output document will be stripped to ImageHeight / ImageWidth, if ScalePage is True output document will be scaled to ImageHeight / ImageWidth.

ScaleProportions.description: Constrain proportions when scaling the output image.

ScaleIfLarger.description: Scaling only if the input image is larger than the output.

TextAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of text subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum text antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

GraphicsAntialiasing.description:
Control the use of graphics content subsample antialiasing. The subsampling box size should be 4 bits for optimum graphics content antialiasing, but smaller values can be used for faster rendering.
 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

ImageInterpolation.description: Specifies whether the image parser should use image interpolation. Enabling image interpolation will result in higher quality for scaled images at the expense of speed.

UseCIEColor.description: Specifies whether the image parser should remap the device-dependent.

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.

TiffType.description:

 * `color24nc` - Color - 24bits RGB output, uncompressed
 * `color32nc` - Color - 32bits CMYK output, uncompressed
 * `color24lzw` - Color - 24bits RGB, LZW-compatible compression
 * `color32lzw` - Color - 32bits CMYK, LZW-compatible compression

 * `grayscalelzw` - Grayscale - 8bits output, LZW-compatible compression

 * `monochromeg32d` - Monochrome - 2-D G3 fax encoding
 * `monochromeg4` - Monochrome - G4 fax encoding
 * `monochromelzw` - Monochrome - LZW-compatible compression
 * `monochromepackbits` - Monochrome - PackBits compression

FillOrder.description:
The logical order of bits within a byte.

 * `1` - LSB-to-MSB

 * `0` - None
 * `1` - 1 bit
 * `2` - 2 bits
 * `4` - 4 bits

/convert/xps/to/pdf.summary: XPS to PDF File Conversion API
/convert/xps/to/pdf.description:
The API for converting XPS documents to PDF files. 
 Read more about the converter here: https://www.convertapi.com/xps-to-pdf

StoreFile.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.

File.description: File to be converted. Value can be URL or file content.

FileName.description: Converted output file name without extension. The extension will be added automatically.

DetectPageSize.description: Detect and convert custom page sizes.

PdfVersion.description:
Set PDF version.
 * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2)
 * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3)
 * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4)
 * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5)
 * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6)
 * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7)
 * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3)
 * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)

PdfTitle.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.

PdfSubject.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.

PdfAuthor.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.

PdfKeywords.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.

OpenPage.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.

OpenZoom.description:
Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files .
 * `Default` - Default
 * `ActualSize` - Actual Size
 * `FitPage` - Fit Page
 * `FitWidth` - Fit Width
 * `FitHeight` - Fit Height
 * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible
 * `25` - 25%
 * `50` - 50%
 * `75` - 75%
 * `100` - 100%
 * `125` - 125%
 * `150` - 150%
 * `200` - 200%
 * `400` - 400%
 * `800` - 800%
 * `1600` - 1600%
 * `2400` - 2400%
 * `3200` - 3200%
 * `6400` - 6400%

RotatePage.description:
Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text.
 * `Disabled` - Disabled
 * `ByPage` - By Page
 * `All` - All

SubsetFonts.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.

SubsetFontsThreshold.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.

ColorSpace.description:
Set PDF color space.
 * `Default` - Default
 * `RGB` - RGB
 * `CMYK` - CMYK
 * `Gray` - Gray

ConversionCost.description: This amount will be deducted from your balance after the conversion.
